title: BIT.TRIP RUNNER
description:
BIT.TRIP RUNNER is the fastest hybrid platforms and exciting music and game you've ever seen!

Run for the Moon, kicking glass walls and dodging the jaws of hungry slugs moles!Robotic Mines throwing crosses and face to face with the MecaMinero!Take to the Big City on a quest to find your friends and fight alongside them against the final boss!

RUNNER is the fourth chapter of the BIT.TRIP saga, award winning and critically acclaimed.

Make CommanderVideo run, jump, slide, kick and more!
Super-addictive Gameplay! "Just one more game", say ...
With exciting modern and classic challenges, before you have over 50 levels!
The large group of chiptune Anamanaguchi makes a guest appearance!
Join CommanderVideo in BIT.TRIP RUNNER on his most legendary journey so far!


Main features in Steam:
Bookmarks!
Achievements!
Easy and Hard-new!
